name: Mathatomic
description:
Mathatomic is a trivia style math game with nice simple graphics. It keeps track of your score and allows you to write on the screen. 

Tips. Click on the atoms nucleus to change the music. The harder the difficulty the more points you will earn.

As of right now with the current release you can play up to Phase 7. That is 70 randomly generated questions. Working on more phases now!
